1.title: Study Vue.js Basics
1.description: Learn the basic concepts of Vue.js, including components and directives.

2.title: Write and Connect Backend
2.description: Develop the backend to handle requests and connect to a database.

3.title: Frontend Development with Vue.js
3.description: Build the frontend of the application using Vue.js.

4.title: Implement Database Integration
4.description: Connect the backend with the database to perform CRUD operations.

5.title: Testing the Application
5.description: Test the application for bugs and ensure all features work correctly.

6.title: Deploy the Application
6.description: Prepare and deploy the application to a hosting service.

7.title: Gather Feedback
7.description: Collect feedback from users to improve the application.

8.title: Enhance Application Features
8.description: Add additional features based on user feedback and suggestions.
